description: I've used this to edit many mp3 id tags. Works great.

This app is right up there with a similar app like "PuddleTag". But the interface is quite different and takes time to get used to. Once you get your bearings though, you'll soon discover who good this music tagging app is.

Unlike "PuddleTag", it work good even on smaller screens. Entering data is straightforward and there's a couple of buttons to auto-number your tracks and enter total tracks. Be sure to investigate right-clicking to see handy menu options.

You can select an entire album track list by double-clicking on a blank area below the song titles, which I find very handy and convenient. I'm sure I could play around with the app settings for awhile and discover new things along the way.

I highly recommend this app (and I'm very fussy about my Linux apps). I was even able to tag 5.1 surround FLAC files. Very nice indeed.
summary: This app gets the job done!

description: es excelente programa soporta tag v1 v2 v3, ademas de tener varías herramientas para facilitar el cambio de metadatos e imagenes en tus archivos de audio. la verdad, excelente.
complète et intuitive à la première utilisation
